works.name: CBot | Auto Trading Crypto Currency
works.description:
CBot is a website that supports automated trading between various currencies of Crypto and Fiat like Bitcoin, Etherium, US Dollar, and Japanese Yen.
It supports Binance and bitFlyer as a trading platform.
works.role:
Feburary 2018 - April 2018   |   Full-Stack Developer   |   CBot LLC

I worked on UI pages and trading module based on Dollar-Cost Averaging strategy.
works.technologies: FuelPHP / MySQL / Binance APIs / bitFlyer APIs

works.name: SmartPitch Hands Free Speeds
works.description:
SmartPitchÂ® turns your smartphone into a Hands Free PRECISION SPEED GUN FOR PITCHING & HITTING!!!
Hands-free, automatic, not a toy stop-watch app. As accurate as $1,200 radar guns at less than 1% the cost. Charts and history of all pitches and hits.

- Core engine that processes camera image feeds using cvBlob and calculate the speed of ball
- Fix memory leaks and app crashes
works.technologies: Objective-C / Java / C++ / Android NDK / cvBlob(OpenCV)

works.name: Mentor | Evaluation Tool
works.description:
Mentor is a web and mobile application that gives trainees the ability to upload videos to designated experts for evaluations, coaching and feedback.
The experts review the videos while recording audio commentary and annotating the video with drawing tools.
works.role:
April 2016 - September 2016   |   Frontend Developer   |   Tesla

I worked on App UI with REST API data and core engine to process video and audio data using AVFoundation and FFmpeg.
